website_summaries.verdict: This compact case is praised for its clever design and impressive protection.
pros: Plastic durable enough to last for years
Multi-layered damage protection sets this case apart
Customers rave over the supreme protection this case offers their iPad
cons: Not as snug in width as it is in height
A pricey option when compared to other cases

customer_reviews.title: Apple Pencil works!
customer_reviews.text: I just received it, so I don’t have any experience with it yet. It fits good on my iPad 6. I have an Otterbox on my iPhone and I’m very pleased with it. It saved my phone many times when my toddler threw it on the tile. I was worried that the Apple Pencil won’t work with it on and I couldn’t find any clear answers to this, so I wanted to write a review to let people know that it works fine.
customer_reviews.author: B.C. Booth

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Product, But Be Sure of the Model
customer_reviews.text: Love Otterbox products and this one was no exception. However, Apple's decision to call the newest generation of the iPad just "iPad" did not make finding the proper model particularly easy. Purchased the wrong one and then had to wait three months for the correct one to become available. Everything should be okay now, though identifying the right model may still be a little testy.
customer_reviews.author: Just Another Mike

customer_reviews.title: Fits 2017 iPad!!!
customer_reviews.text: After doing a lot of research on if this would fit this years iPad from the black Friday sales...I decided to to go with it! There are mixed review on whether or not this fits...IT DOES FIT the iPad 2017 version sold on black Friday (wifi only tablet with 32G)! As always Otterbox cases are the best when it comes to protection! I wouldn't buy any other case for myself and especially not for my kids! You cannot go wrong buying this for your iPad if you want it to last!
customer_reviews.author: Hollidays

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: This case fit perfectly and is extremely durable! I use it while running on the treadmill, so I needed something that wouldn't slide off of the plastic holder on the treadmill itself. It's perfect and not cheaply made! I have always loved Otter Box cases!!
customer_reviews.author: V8Mustang

customer_reviews.title: Protects my iPad from the drops and bumps that life throws at me
customer_reviews.text: I have purchased the OtterBox Defender series for each of my iPhones, so I was glad to see that they make one for my iPad as well. The multi-layer protection is works, guarding against drops, dents, and scratches, though you still have the necessary access to the buttons and charging ports without removing the case. And when it's time to trade-in my device, I will get top dollar for my unbroken and unscratched iPad.
customer_reviews.author: Old Geek

customer_reviews.title: Must have with kids!
customer_reviews.text: You can’t beat OtterBox for a tough as nails case. We got two of these for our 4.5 year olds iPads. They are rough and drop them a lot and these cases are doing a fabulous job. They go on very securely and I like the built in screen protector. The tough snap on cover is nice to have for travel and I like how you can use the cover as a stand as well. I definitely recommend these cases.
customer_reviews.author: Kathryn

customer_reviews.title: Great Otterbox quality
customer_reviews.text: So far, so good. I have only had this case for a day, but based on my experience with Otterbox cases for an iPad 2 from 2011 (which has been kept in perfect condition with the Otterbox Defender case from that time despite numerous drops to the floor) and two iPhones, I imagine this will be the same great quality. Easy to put on and fits well. Arrived on time and in "frustration-free" packaging. A little pricey, but worth the investment to protect an expensive device. It would be nice if this case came in other colors besides black.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: MUST HAVE CASE FOR iPADS!!!
customer_reviews.text: This is the only case we get for our iPads now. Had a cheap folding cover case on the previous iPad and one small drop and the iPad was done for. Got this for the new 2017 iPad and it has already protected it from drops. HIGHLY recommend this case if you have kids, travel a lot and / or are a clumsy adult (like me). This case fully encases your iPad, the screen and home button cover do not hinder the touch sensitiveness of the screen and doesn't distort the image either. Get this case once and your iPad is protected for life. Great customer service from Otterbox as well.
customer_reviews.author: Surf Mama

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy well-fitting protection for the iPad
customer_reviews.text: The OtterBox Defender case for the iPad is a solid well-fitting case that really protects the device. We became sold on the Defender case after experiencing a broken screen due to a drop while an iPad was in a standard portfolio-style case. We are on our third iPad now, with #2 lasting for years (until the battery couldn't hold a charge) due to the protection of the Defender. No problems operating the device through the protective screen cover. Controls activated through the skin are a bit stiff, but not unworkable. Using the solid/opaque screen cover as a stand with two viewing angles works great.
customer_reviews.author: M. Jenkins

customer_reviews.title: Make sure every button is accessible.
customer_reviews.text: I have a iPadAir 532ll/A. I had to replace an identical case which developed a broken corner. So it will no longer remain seated on it’ Upright position. Too bad. If it had been any of the other corners it would not have been a problem. This replacement looked like a perfect fit except for one problem. The plastic opening which allows the two plastic sound buttons to be pressed partially blocks you from pressing the mute button. Its a manufacturing screw up. I actually thought of taking my Drexel tool to it to make I just a bit wider, but that’s not why I paid such a high price. So I just returned it.
customer_reviews.author: REA

customer_reviews.title: LOVE Otterbox Defender
customer_reviews.text: I have otter box defender cases on all of our i-phones and i-pads at home. I have 6 active kids (ages 6 - 12) and we haven't had a cracked screen or water accident yet.. going on 4 years! My kids wish there were better colors or designs, but personally, I just want our devices to last so I don't care what colors the case comes in! Also - I'm issued a phone from my employer, and it is mandatory that we use an otter box defender case that is provided by my employer. That is how I learned about them and I won't use any other case now.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda  McKenzie

customer_reviews.title: Gottcha' Covered
customer_reviews.text: If you are looking to protect your iPad for the vagaries of everyday life, this is the case for you. It provide all around(read corners) protection and in fact does cover the iPad completely. The touch screen works fine, even though it is completely covered. The stand is also very helpful as you can arrange it in several different configurations. I have had many iPads and always put a OtterBox Defender on them. This case is not water proof, so keep it way from water. This is a great case, that protects the iPad, and is always a welcome addition to an iPad experience.
customer_reviews.author: Reviewinator

customer_reviews.title: First-rate case, well worth the money
customer_reviews.text: EXCELLENT protection for the iPad. It has three ‘configurations: a hard plastic back and bezel rim, which is how I usually use it, and I recently fumbled my Pad to have landing face-down on bare concrete from about 18”. No damage of any kind. The second configuration wraps a rubber raincoat that seals the ports and covers all seams. This makes it thicker, easier to grip, more rugged-feeling. The last is another hard plastic shell that the second config fits into, particularly covering the back and corners, providing considerably greater impact protection. It also can pop up an easel for you, but it has no further screen protection.
customer_reviews.author: Arundel

customer_reviews.title: Saved our Ipad! Great case.
customer_reviews.text: I bought a cheapo case for our Ipad at Walmart. Our son took it outside unbeknownst to me and the Ipad came in with tons of cracks at the bottom. We got this case trying to prevent the cracks from getting worse, and it has been great and done just that. Wish I had bypassed the $20 Walmart case and gone straight to this one. I think our Ipad wouldn't have cracked at all if it'd had this case on it. My husband has used Otter products on his cell phone for years, and he's never had a crack on his phone. These cases aren't cheap, but they are worth it in order to protect your devices.
customer_reviews.author: Missy

customer_reviews.title: Great protection
customer_reviews.text: We haul our iPads everywhere for music gigs, and this case does a great job in protecting them. Good quality -- protects the iPad from accidental drops and mishaps. It does make the iPad a little heavy, and the front cover works best as a stand when you're going horizontal rather than vertical, but you can solve that by getting a separate stand for vertical. For gigs, we just put it on a regular music stand. There are iPad holders that attach to mic stands, but unfortunately, they don't offer any protection to the iPad while it's in the holder, so we've opted for this method instead.
customer_reviews.author: Jen B.

customer_reviews.title: These are the best. Have had these on all the different devices ...
customer_reviews.text: These are the best. Have had these on all the different devices kids have had over the years. The cases have outlasted the machines. Ipads and samsung tablets have survived innumerable spills, being stepped on, and the occasional toss across the room. One survived being "washed" by a kid under a full stream of water in the sink. I had also purchased two different and much less expensive cases along the way that claimed the same kind of protection as the otterbox, but that was a joke. Each of those let spills in and collected dust under the screen and I wound up getting otterboxes to replace them in the end, anyway.
customer_reviews.author: Sb

customer_reviews.title: Customer Service is horrible.
customer_reviews.text: While I’m generally a fan of Otterbox products, I’m not a fan of their customer service. I’ve submitted over half dozen warranty claims for their product, only to receive no response. This is horrible customer service and their warranty is nothing more than vaporware.
customer_reviews.author: WK

customer_reviews.title: Better than the rest...
customer_reviews.text: A sturdy case for my iPad is a necessity. I broke one once because I listened to someone that didn’t think I’m as clumsy as I am. Never again. I used to swear by the Griffin Survivor cases, but those have gone down hill in my opinion. I am now an OtterBox girl for as long as they make these and keep them up to this quality. The stand feature is better than Griffin ever was.
customer_reviews.author: Kristen Staubitz

customer_reviews.title: Loving the Quality
customer_reviews.text: I’ve gone through a few iPad cases on amazon. This is the best I’ve ever had. Like with my phone, I have a habit of dropping my iPad. The screen protector and outter shell has stayed intact throughout it all. I noticed no scratches. Some dirt gets under the button opening. Most important part is that my devices have been protected no matter what. The quality in the material is great. I noticed that unlike with other cases, the outter shell does not stretch out. I like the clip on stand a lot. This is money well spent. Avoid other cases and just buy otter box.
customer_reviews.author: ChristineML

customer_reviews.title: Touchscreen Does Not Work
customer_reviews.text: I expected a lot more from an Otterbox. Once the case was installed the touchscreen on my ipad did not work properly around the perimeter of the screen. The case is super bulky and the display stand has one setting and it is not ideal. When I attempted to remove the case it cracked my screen! Now I have a broken ipad screen and a worthless case that I wouldn't give to anyone. I am requesting a return but have not gotten a response. Please be aware and do not purchase this product.
customer_reviews.author: Barrett Giles

customer_reviews.title: love it
customer_reviews.text: I broke another case and it broke my ipad. ouch..quite an expense. I think this looks like it will do the trick. I havent dropped it yet. Thank God. But it looks a thousand times sturdier and protective. It fits snug. The last type I had - had some wiggle room. My husband swears by otterbox. I never tried it because I wanted the pretty glittery girly ones. It was pretty. It was glittery. It was girly. But it cost me a price I wasn't willing to pay. So now I'm common sense protected. Maybe otterbox will make something more girly looking someday. Thanks for the quick delivery. You were a blessing to me.
customer_reviews.author: Sandra M. Wakefield

customer_reviews.title: No Color Choice, Not Durable, Too expensive, Better options available
customer_reviews.text: Minus 1 Star: No color choice. We own three iPads and have to have different colors to tell "which is which" Minus 1 Star: Durability: With heavy use the rubber around the edges loosens. Minus 1 Star: Price, way too expensive given the lack of durability Minus 1 Star: Not competitive. Our global organization switched from this model to one of the similar looking knockoffs. At first I was skeptical but many falls later I'm a convert, plus so far there have been no durability issues.
customer_reviews.author: WildCat13

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy but heavy.
customer_reviews.text: OtterBox case was sturdy and protected the iPad from my three year old. However, the case adds weight and bulk to the iPad. It was also a little difficult to open the inner plastic shell. If you need to protect your iPad from little hands, I recommend it but do note it will be heavier to carry around.
customer_reviews.author: Karina Ward

customer_reviews.title: Best Case Ever Made!
customer_reviews.text: I love the Otterbox Defender Series for my electronic equipment; it’s the best on the market!!! I was very satisfied with my Otterbox for my iPhone that I definitely needed the same protection for my iPad. It has a built-in screen protector but it advises to add another screen film with it for double protection. The Defender Series is the only way to go if you want to keep your products damage free for years!!!
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia A. Costa

customer_reviews.title: Bought non-Otterbox first - shouldn't have!
customer_reviews.text: I purchase another highly ranked iPad cover on Amazon Prime for my son's iPad. It got tipped off an end table, hit on its edge which shattered the screen. I had Otterbox previously on two older iPads and I know they survived similar trauma. Granted, this could have been a fluke but I put the new iPad replacement back into an Otterbox. These cases are just so good and they are worth the price if you don't want to pay for the i-Warranty.
customer_reviews.author: Darren Schmidt

customer_reviews.title: Warranty is worthless. Falling apart.
customer_reviews.text: Deteriorating rubber makes me wary of ordering this case again. I have ordered several defender cases over the years. However, the two cases that I ordered in 2018 are both deteriorating and no longer protect my mobile devices. Otterbox has a great warranty, however, the call center has been closed for COVID and the online warranty claims form is not working properly so I’m just out of luck, I guess. I would not purchase again!
customer_reviews.author: alexisg112

customer_reviews.title: It is a very sturdy protective case
customer_reviews.text: It is a very sturdy protective case. Just what I expected from Otter. I like the two different ways to use the stand. Opening and using it not as convenient as other covers/cases like the Kate Spade one (which I loved when I had the IPad 2) . But the cover and base “pop apart” easily enough and I feel confident when I shove it into my cluttered bag or backpack, confident that it’s protected no matter how I mistreat it. Didn’t get the full star rating because it’s not as pretty as Kate spade.
customer_reviews.author: Kathy Paddock

customer_reviews.title: Tough little case
customer_reviews.text: This case offers a lot of protection and functionality. The hard cover has a stand built in so you can prop it up on a table and video chat. In the almost 10 years I have had my iphones and ipads in these defender cases I have not had one broken screen. They have the added benefit of making the ipad, or phone easier to grip because the case is rubber. A must buy with any new Idevice.
customer_reviews.author: Gregory K

customer_reviews.title: Tough case, hut iPad remains fully functional
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for a work iPad. I'm an HVAC service technician, and this thing is with me in my bag and truck, getting knocked around, dropped and has metal tools impact the screen, and except for see very minor scratches that can only be seem when the screen is off, it looks brand new. Highly recommend this for people who are hard on their iPads. The finger print reader works fine through the case, as do all the buttons.
customer_reviews.author: Interested Party

customer_reviews.title: Awesome protection I can't live without
customer_reviews.text: Serious protection for my Ipad. I'm drop happy over here and I have Otterbox's on all my phones and Ipads just because I drop stuff all the time or miss a counter something. Otterbox Defender's have saved my devices from most certain death every time. I would not buy any other product just because I would not be able to trust it not knowing if it would protect as well as this. If you purchase an electronic item protect it right away. To me they are investments.
customer_reviews.author: Sharon

customer_reviews.title: Cracked Ipad Screen-beware
customer_reviews.text: Had this 6 months. Dropped Ipad from table 18 inches off the floor and the ipad screen cracked. Have been happy with the other Otterbox I have purchased. This one did not save my ipad from damage like it should have.
customer_reviews.author: Diane Novinger

customer_reviews.title: OTTERBOX DEFENDER SERIES ROCKS
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this otterbox case. I always trust otterbox defender series to protecting all my devices! I did a test on the defender series case on my iPhone 6plus. I put I on the ground and ran in over with my car. Yes!!, I’m a little adventurous as no one would have probably done what I did but guess what?!?!? To my surprise my phone and case was 100% damage free. I use nothing but otterbox defender cases!
customer_reviews.author: hisBUNNYBABY808

customer_reviews.title: Works Well with my Ipad
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to protect my new Ipad and it fits great. Light weight and easy to install. I like the feel of it and I do feel it protects my Ipad. Although I haven't dropped my Ipad to test the durability I do feel it would keep it safe if I did drop it from a short distance. Overall happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Sissy

customer_reviews.title: Solid product
customer_reviews.text: I’m really happy with this case! It’s easy to install and provides all the protection I want. The clear surface piece doesn’t affect typing or display visibility at all. Having the build in stand for landscape and portrait orientations is awesome. All the ports and buttons are easily accessible as well. This case is a bit more expensive than others, but well worth it.
customer_reviews.author: TD03063

customer_reviews.title: Otter Box is the best
customer_reviews.text: I had a different case for my Apple tablet but returned it after taking it out of the box...too flimsy. This is a bit heavy but the enclosed stand portion solves that. Between my grandkids and myself, protection is needed and this delivers. It has been dropped and sat on and like every Otter Box I have owned, it fully protects my device. Worth every penny!
customer_reviews.author: Donna

customer_reviews.title: All OtterBox
customer_reviews.text: I use OtterBox on all my devices, they have always protected my devices well. I waited on getting this one for my iPad because it was just too expensive. When the price finally became what I considered reasonable I ordered it. I am very pleased with my purchase and would recommend it to others. One side note, it does make my iPad heavier but that is to be expected for good protection.
customer_reviews.author: Rickers

customer_reviews.title: great case for the money
customer_reviews.text: so this is where otter box thrives. these are great durable cases that last for years. we have used these cases for many different iPhones and iPads over the years. i think this might be our 7th or so. they work great and will keep your iPad clean and protected. the cover has a built in stand that allows for several viewing angles. our family definitely gets the money worth
customer_reviews.author: William R. Beggs, Jr

customer_reviews.title: Roadtrip approved!
customer_reviews.text: As always, OtterBox for the win! Put it on the family iPad and protects it from the kids dropping it on road trips and propping up to watch videos. It adds quite a bit of weight to the iPad, but is totally worth it's level of coverage. The plastic cover is easy to remove for a younger child, and setting up into video angles is a breeze! Case works perfect for roads trips on the lap.
customer_reviews.author: Josh

customer_reviews.title: Didn't save my screen!
customer_reviews.text: I have been an otterbox fan for years. No issues ever. Not anymore. I purchased this case in November 2017 - wasn't actually used until December as it was a gift, well this past weekend (July 2018) it fell off the couch, on to carpet. The screen on my ipad is now shattered and I am looking at $150 to have that replaced. I will not buy otterbox again.
customer_reviews.author: JZ

customer_reviews.title: It’s okay
customer_reviews.text: When I bought this it was a lot cheaper than it is now. The back case go stand it up broken within a few months. It’s also very heavy and bulky. I still added a screen protector onto the iPad itself because this did fall in this case 3 feet and cracked the screen protector. Not as safe as I thought. I recently just replaced this case with something else.
customer_reviews.author: Hannah testa

customer_reviews.title: This was a nice case. kept my iPad (2017 new 9
customer_reviews.text: This was a nice case. kept my iPad (2017 new 9.5 in) safe. i dropped it with the holder on it. the holder is like a hard plastic so it made a loud crash like something cracked but its similar to the clip on the iPhone otter box. i just took it off. its not too heavy. its important to know its not waterproof. possibly water resistant. has air tight shut open/close flaps for the charger insert and headphone jack
customer_reviews.author: SallySal

customer_reviews.title: Safe and sturdy
customer_reviews.text: This case works great! We had one prior to this that survived 2 years of toddler abuse, water splashes and falling off the car. It finally cracked and we didn’t want to risk our valuable investment being compromised so we bought another. It works great and even has a stand for you to prop the iPad up and watch your streaming apps.
customer_reviews.author: TNg

customer_reviews.title: Great Cases!
customer_reviews.text: Great Case! I work in schools in special education. I put these on ALL or iPads. I bought this one for my wife who works in hospitals and needed something sturdy and something that cancan be wiped down all day. They are not waterproof, but can be cleaned with disinfectant wipes. I have some of these cases that I’ve used for years!
customer_reviews.author: T-Bone

customer_reviews.title: Follows in the great Otterbox tradition
customer_reviews.text: It continues the Otterbox tradition. It fits the iPad perfectly (although it is tight, so follow the instructions carefully) and has a rubber texture to it, so there is less of a chance of it slipping out of your hands. The stand it has, is also the perfect cover for the front screen while traveling with it. It significantly reduces (or maybe even eliminates) the chance of any scratches on the screen while traveling.
customer_reviews.author: Adam W.

customer_reviews.title: Best case protection ever
customer_reviews.text: I love the OtterBox Defender products and use them for adult and children apple devices. My children were 6 when they got their ipad minis and have accidentally dropped the devices multiple times with no damage! They are now 7 & 9 and still have the devices with no issues. I recently purchased another for my husband's new iPad as well. I have found it unnecessary to purchase insurance through apple when the device is covered by the Otterbox defender case.
customer_reviews.author: Bethany C. Roy

customer_reviews.title: Save your money
customer_reviews.text: Only had my ipad a month as I bought this case and it at the same time. My ipad slipped from my lap while standing and shattered. First time it ever fell and now I have been quoted at $105 to fix. Will never buy an otterbox case again.
customer_reviews.author: Joanna

customer_reviews.title: Not as bulky as older model
customer_reviews.text: I hated to cover my new iPad but it had to be done. We had an Otterbox on our ancient iPad 2. I was pleasantly surprised to receive my new Otterbox and find it is not nearly as bulky. I really wish it could be colorful and pretty but protection is more important. Maybe someday. Hint. Hint.
customer_reviews.author: HappyToRead

customer_reviews.title: It works!
customer_reviews.text: I worked at a children's hospital for 15 years and used this on our iPads that the kids played with daily and NEVER had an issue with anything happening to my iPad, even when it was dropped on a tile floor! I now bought one for my three rough and tough boys because I know that it does its job.
customer_reviews.author: packrbackr

customer_reviews.title: Love this case
customer_reviews.text: Looks great. Love the material, kinda rubber feel, that is easy to grip. Made just like my phone case which I have had for two years and it has protected my phone from drops on the driveway, concrete floor in the basement, and my three year old grandson using it. The hard plastic cover makes a great stand and added protection when packing the iPad for travel. Would definitely buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Betty

customer_reviews.title: Top notch protection and a great warranty
customer_reviews.text: The Defender has been my go to case for all technology products. They are durable and consistent in protecting my phone and iPads. The warranty is fantastic if the case does happen to crack (once in 5 years of using them). Installation isn’t too challenging, but taking the item back out of the case can be a painful process if you need to clean it.
customer_reviews.author: MLau

customer_reviews.title: OTTABOXIT!
customer_reviews.text: When your school requires you to bring an electronic copy of the text book to class- OTTABOXIT! When your three year old is done watching that episode of Doc McStuffins and you aren't close enough to catch the ipad when she throws it- OTTABOXIT! When you just spent too much money on an ipad and didn't want to spend and extra couple hundred on applecare- OTTABOXIT!
customer_reviews.author: Brenna Gwyn Snowe

customer_reviews.title: Love this case, returned my other one!
customer_reviews.text: I originally ordered a Spigen case that has a stand on the back but ran into issues with the glass it came with and then the frame of the plastic case not fitting my iPad properly. I returned the spigen case and ordered this instead and it’s perfect! I have an Anker glass protector on my iPad and this otter box case still fit perfectly! I have otter boxes on my daughter’s and husband’s iPads... I should’ve known better and just ordered this from the beginning!
customer_reviews.author: SM13

customer_reviews.title: Best Case for iPad
customer_reviews.text: I travel to an adult school where I teach computer classes. I needed the ultimate protection for my iPad. This is it. Your device is completely surrounded by OtterBox protection. Would buy again. Great features with the ability of the stand to allow multiple ways for the iPad to adjust for use. The clam shell case may not be practical for arthritic hands.
customer_reviews.author: Donald

customer_reviews.title: Its simply to heavy to be practical
customer_reviews.text: I have had at least 10 otterbox cases for everything form Ipad to ipod touch to iphone, could not be happier with all of them. I was so confident, I ordered the case first and then went and bought the ipad, did not want to risk a minute of the ipad being unprotected. Unfortunately, it is simply to heavy to be practical. I need to put it on the stand for everything. I would not recommend this case under any circumstances.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel M-E

customer_reviews.title: Overbuilt and Overpriced
customer_reviews.text: This comes in two pieces. One fits around your iPad and one lets you lean the iPad for ease of viewing. Pressing the iPad buttons is super hard due to the thick plastic and opening the flap to attach the charger is difficult. I guess this is a case of over engineering and it cost a lot of money.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly Donahue Herder

customer_reviews.title: Good For Businesses that buy iPads for Techs!
customer_reviews.text: We buy these for all of our technicians iPads. They aren't too heavy and bulky, but also give a good amount of protection. The only real con (which is for every case like this) is when the screen is attached and it gets dirty you have to take the whole thing apart. Also, it gets a lot of little scratches on the plastic screen easily.
customer_reviews.author: Jill

customer_reviews.title: Only case I will use
customer_reviews.text: This is the only case I will buy. I haven’t had a cracked screen yet because it protects so well. I use this product for all my devices. Decal family members have dropped & thank goodness it’s amazing in stopping breakage. I’ve had zero repairs thanks to the sturdiness.
customer_reviews.author: Punk

customer_reviews.title: Picked Otterbox based on past performances.
customer_reviews.text: Big fan of the Otterbox Defender series for my iPad and iPhones. Finally replaced a 5-year-old iPad—protected by a well-worn Otterbox—with a new iPad. Case fits like a glove, and I expect it to keep this tablet in pristine condition.
customer_reviews.author: B. Johnson

customer_reviews.title: The most important purchase you will make for you iPad!
customer_reviews.text: I love Otterbox products. I have one for my iPhone and I just bought this one for my new iPad. It has a little weight to it, but it feels solid. Have dropped it on my tile floor already, and not a scratch. I will be purchasing Otterbox cases from now on with my Apple products. Also it come with a handy stand which has 2 different options. The stand also doubles for a front case cover. So know you have double the protection for your iPad. For the price, you can’t go wrong.($40.00)
customer_reviews.author: BASHEM72

customer_reviews.title: Great product to protect my investment
customer_reviews.text: Have an otter box on my iPhone. Now I have one on my new iPad. These cases are beasts. No one else comes close. My only beef, it's a small one, there should be an external stand not the one inside the outer case. Not enough variety to prop up but otherwise this case is well with the money. My next electronic devise will have an otterbox case on it. They need to make one for my car!! :-)
customer_reviews.author: Ron P.

customer_reviews.title: It has a spot for the Pencil!
customer_reviews.text: At the time of my purchase, it didn't say that it had a spot for the Pencil, but it does! Clicks in easily and puts my mind at ease that iPad and Pencil will be safe while I'm working, commuting and traveling.
customer_reviews.author: Cliff Glowacki

customer_reviews.title: These things are pretty bullet proof. I’ve used them for years and will continue to do so.
customer_reviews.text: I’m a little rough on my devices so every device I’ve owned since my old iPhone 4 and iPad mini was/is wrapped in a Defender. Never had any damage to my devices, and twice I’ve had to replace a silicon sleeve long after the warranty expired, yet Otterbox still replaced them for free. The things are bullet proof and Otterbox is a great company that stands behind it’s products.
customer_reviews.author: The Flying Dutchman

customer_reviews.title: Great quality, brand new
customer_reviews.text: Wow so much cheaper than buying in the store! Also brand new and in the box. What a great quality case at an affordable price. We were very luck, we just got the screen replaced on our iPad 6th gen and didn't want to upgrade quite yet so I ordered this case in hopes of extending the life of the iPad even longer!
customer_reviews.author: Jay

customer_reviews.title: Price'y but worth every penny!
customer_reviews.text: This new case is to replace the exact same case that has been on my IPad for about 10 years. The old case was literally hanging off of my IPad in bits and pieces, but it did it's job and did it very very well. When the case was removed I was amazed to find that my IPad is in pristine condition, the touch screen did not even need to be cleaned . The whole IPad looked brand new. As a retired commercial Diver I have used Otter boxes for decades I should not have been surprised at how well it did it's job.
customer_reviews.author: James Waldrop

customer_reviews.title: This is the way to go
customer_reviews.text: Great investment. I got it for my sons iPad and although he has dropped it a few times already, all the casing works and best of all the iPad is still in perfect condition. Very happy with the all inclusive protection and stand functions. Very helpful and useful.
customer_reviews.author: Justleeway

customer_reviews.title: Best Protection & Price for your IPad
customer_reviews.text: The best case ever for my IPad. Loved this so much I bought this again because I gave my first iPad to my husband. Never had any problems with the first nor any with this one. My daughter in-law recommended this to me as she has one too. Great price and best protection indeed! A+++++
customer_reviews.author: Oma

customer_reviews.title: Great Protection
customer_reviews.text: If you take your iPad everywhere with you, I highly recommend this case. It's the same protection you've gotten used to from your otterbox cases you've had on your phone for years. Screen protector will keep your screen safe while the dual layer protection on the body will protect you from moisture and drops!
customer_reviews.author: D. Morris

customer_reviews.title: Great case, watch the shipping options!
customer_reviews.text: I work outside with my iPad daily, this case is great! With the plastic cover it is bulky, but not heavy. If you dont specify, amazon pulls a retail package and ships it! Fortunately for me I have an honest park manager. Not sure why the hell they do that...
customer_reviews.author: Greg Thompson

customer_reviews.title: Best iPad protection.
customer_reviews.text: When I bought my new iPad, I knew I would need a new cover but was reluctant to spend the $80 for this model. Fortunately, I found it on Amazon for $45 and took the plunge. I am so glad I decided to purchase it as it is the best protection I have found plus having four reading postions and a space for the Apple pencial or stylus makes it perfect for my needs.
customer_reviews.author: artistkim

customer_reviews.title: Expensive,bulky but good protection.
customer_reviews.text: Bulky but great protection. A little hard to get apart to use but keeps my iPad safe. Adds a lot of size to my iPad which I don't like. Expensive-very!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Top of the Line—Buy This Now!
customer_reviews.text: Definitely worth the money. My last OtterBox Defender Series was just tossed in the recycling bin after 5+ years of keeping my iPad Air in literal flawless condition. Not a single scratch, chip, dent or abrasion to be seen on the device and only minor, reasonable wear and tear to the case itself (after regular daily use for school and work). I just purchased this newest one and it seems even sturdier (if that was even possible) with cleaner lines and minor stylistic changes.
customer_reviews.author: Steven

customer_reviews.title: Great for work
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my work iPad and I’m happy with it. I know that I don’t have to worry about breaking my iPad at work now. It definitely makes it easier to handle. I want to make it clear that this is for the 6th generation 9.7” iPad and NOT the 9.7” Pro. The Pro is 1mm thinner and neither case are interchangeable. My co-worker made this mistake.
customer_reviews.author: Mitchell

customer_reviews.title: Good protection
customer_reviews.text: Super sturdy, lightweight and strong, I’ve accidentally dropped my ipad in this thing twice now and it’s holding up well. A side bonus is its alot easier to remove from the case than their older models so thats even better!
customer_reviews.author: Fenix

customer_reviews.title: Like it
customer_reviews.text: I like that it is less bulky and more lightweight while still maintaining good protection. One unfortunate side effect that is understandable and worth the inconvenience is that the home button doesn’t read the fingerprint as well.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Dickens

customer_reviews.title: Must have if you are as careless and have butterfingers like me
customer_reviews.text: I went through two $20 cheap cases on my old iPad, decided to spend more to protect my new device, definitely worth it. I have sent it flying a couple of times and no cracks on case or IPad, kind of a chore at first to get to headphone and charger port at first, but seems to be easier once the plugs get a little wear from use
customer_reviews.author: SugaPrkr

customer_reviews.title: More than does the job!
customer_reviews.text: First one I've had for our various-sized iPads and/or iPhones. Decided it was time to protect my newest purchase. It has protected the device on numerous occasions when I've been, shall we say, less than vigilant in my efforts to be careful.
customer_reviews.author: JoAnn P. Harris

customer_reviews.title: 2 steps backwards
customer_reviews.text: I’ve owned OtterBox cases over the years but this case had a useless feature: The thin plastic “screen protector”. I already had a tempered glass screen for my ipad 6th gen so I proceeded to remove the plastic screen glued to the case(honestly this was by far the stupidest thing OtterBox added) at the cost of my thumb receiving a cut. I’ll keep the case because it is very sturdy but I expected far better by OtterBox.
customer_reviews.author: BeethovenR

customer_reviews.title: Best case to protect your iPad!!!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect fit! The case add some weight wich is great, I work in a plant and even though a work in the office there’s a lot of dust around, and this case is the perfect solution. Got it earlier than expected!
customer_reviews.author: Omar Carmona

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality
customer_reviews.text: This case is perfect. I use it for work and it’s mounted in the cockpit for long hours and it’s just sturdy and perfect for that. It could be alittle lighter though. I have 2 iPads both with these cases and they make my flight bag heavy... But durability is perfect. And they look great.
customer_reviews.author: Kimani

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: As usual....works great at protecting my gear. This is my second purchase. First one got chewed on by pup, it did save my iPad though. Wish it weren’t so pricey, but it does the job. Bulky, but worth it in my book.
customer_reviews.author: WildHorses

customer_reviews.title: They live up to their reputation and are worth the ...
customer_reviews.text: They live up to their reputation and are worth the money. With the hard shell on it, it's a little thick for my preference but my wife doesn't mind it. She can throw it in her bag to take to work without any worry of something breaking. She's a speech therapist so she needed something that would protect it from the slippery or sticky hands of little children. I would buy this again in a heartbeat for our next iPad.
customer_reviews.author: Hallibu

customer_reviews.title: Otterbox Saves The Day! (Again)
customer_reviews.text: I love Otterbox cases, and this one has lived up to my expectations. It had no trouble putting it on my iPad and it fit perfectly. It has protected my iPad from my cats, who like to push it off the counter/table. I have trusted Otterbox cases with all my mobile electronics and will continue to do so. One time I dropped my iPhone from the attic to my concrete garage floor, and the phone survived without any scratches or dents.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Worth a buy
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy case to defend your iPad 2017, 5th gen. The case itself is sturdy and of quality build. I expect it to last for a lifetime unless your really rough with things. Best aspect of the case is the stand. It works well for typing on the iPad. No slipping and sliding while trying to type. Make sure you order the right model for your particular iPad.
customer_reviews.author: CrossboneV

customer_reviews.title: We always use Otterbox Defenders
customer_reviews.text: I'm klutzy on a good day. We have Otterbox Defenders on our phones, and so when I bought our Ipad it was the first thing I went hunting for. While not the cheapest option on the market, it is 100% the highest quality. Great quality, easy to use. Love the stand feature, that then turns into the hard cover for the screen. Overall, glad to see Otterbox's commitment to quality never diminishes.
customer_reviews.author: Becca

customer_reviews.title: You need this case
customer_reviews.text: This case is a durable, light weight case. An excellent buy for the price. I travel with my iPad a good bit and I don't need to worry about it being protected. The front protective cover snaps onto the back when you're not using it. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Love otterbox!
customer_reviews.text: Very sturdy case for our iPad. Otterbox is a great brand. I’ve always been happy with their products and this case doesn’t fall short.
customer_reviews.author: Tandemom

customer_reviews.title: Threw it out the window at 50 miles an hr!
customer_reviews.text: Very heavy duty. We bought this for a kid we work with who has autism. He threw his iPad out the car window at 50 miles an hr the other day and when we got it, it was still in perfect shape. The case was scratched up but saved the ipad!
customer_reviews.author: mike deegan

customer_reviews.title: Great Protection, Apple Pencil Friendly
customer_reviews.text: Pros: Works with Apple Pencil Has Apple Pencil holder Has a stand for four different positions Has a built in screen protector Very protective Has a front cover for full 360 protection when not in use Cons: Ads some bulk and weight to the iPad
customer_reviews.author: jjb0894

customer_reviews.title: From iPad to lethal weapon...
customer_reviews.text: I'm only giving it a 3 star weight review because I can't lie... It is a noticeable difference. But, you can also now brandish this technological brick to club your least favorite sibling or relative, and your iPad will never know what happened.
customer_reviews.author: Sebastian Romig

customer_reviews.title: Otterbox is the way to go.
customer_reviews.text: Otterbox has never let me down. Has saved me hundreds of dollars in the long run and a peace of mind after every drop. if their outer rubber shell warps after a while it's because it was in heavy use. So don't blame the product for doing its job. Literally saved my idevices from sure death.
customer_reviews.author: Cmoney

customer_reviews.title: Perfect case.
customer_reviews.text: I always purchase the Otterbox cases for all my devices. This was perfect for my new iPad. I have grandchildren who like to play with it so my Otterbox case gives me the assurance that my investment is protected. However it would be nice to have some color choices other than black. Also it was easy to assemble.
customer_reviews.author: Mary W.

customer_reviews.title: Rugged Protection for Your High-Dollar Investment
customer_reviews.text: Our company used these on their iPads, so when it came time for me to buy an iPad, this was the only case I was ever going to consider. It was beyond my ability to install it properly, so my son did it...LOL. Haven't had to think about it since. It protects my investment well. You should seriously consider one for your iPad as well.
customer_reviews.author: Mike S.

customer_reviews.title: works as advertised
customer_reviews.text: Built like a tank, not easy to get in or out of case but when i drop it im not worried at all about it getting any damage. Its not light weight, but for its bulk its not bad.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Protection
customer_reviews.text: I had ordered these for my 6 and 7 year olds iPads. I have had them on since May 2019. They have dropped them a many of times since then with NO damage to the iPads. Would highly recommended if you have small children or are prone to dropping things.
customer_reviews.author: Sheila

customer_reviews.title: The best case for your iPad
customer_reviews.text: Great product, very sturdy... arrived prompty & as described. My device fit snugly & safely inside, the stand allows user the flexibility to adjust the viewing angle. This is the second Defender case i purchased from Otterbox, no regrets... will purchase again for any new device!
customer_reviews.author: Mype

customer_reviews.title: protection
customer_reviews.text: Like all Otter products this is a brilliant design. But heavy. I have terrible arthritis from a traumatic hand injury. I dropped my new I-Pad 6 just taking it out of the Apple box. I did not bother to even charge it up until I got the Otter. The 'Pad would not have lasted a week without the Otter Box.
customer_reviews.author: Mike in NY

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for our needs
customer_reviews.text: This case fits perfectly on my 6th gen. I have also had the same kind of case on my 4th gen since it was new and the old one is still working great. They are made well and protect wonderfully. The stand works great and has multiple angles, love it and worth every penny.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Rugged but with rounded, soft edges (the inner protective case is surrounded by a softer (silicone?) outer case. Screen component leads me to rate it a four rather than a five. It seems to get smudged easier than the iphone screen itself. Fair tradeoff, though
customer_reviews.author: TMack

customer_reviews.title: Never without one
customer_reviews.text: Whenever I purchase a new iPad, this is the first item I get. I have grandchildren who are always using the iPads & I NEVER have to worry about any of them getting damaged.
customer_reviews.author: Terry C

customer_reviews.title: Great ..... if used properly.
customer_reviews.text: Very protective IF used properly. I never use the hard shell cover that detaches. I miss the old style cover that folds over. I’ve already messed up my 8 month old screen.
customer_reviews.author: Hokie

product_meta.title: OtterBox DEFENDER SERIES Case for iPad (5th Gen) / iPad (6th Gen) - Retail Packaging - BLACK
product_meta.description:
Product Packaging:Standard Packaging

Defend Your Device Against Drops, Dirt and Scrapes With Defender Series. Combining an Internal Shell, Outer Slipcover and Touchscreen Scratch Protector, Defender Series for IPad (5th Gen), IPad (6th Gen) Deflects the Action and Accidents That Come Your Way Every Day. Plus, the Included Shield Stand Doubles as a Kickstand. Defender Series Because Life Happens.

Compatible With: Apple 9.7-Inch IPad (5th Generation, 6th Generation).
feature_bullets: Triple-layer defense: inner shell, outer cover and touchscreen protector
Screen protection: built in to keep your brilliant display flawless
Port covers: stop dirt, dust and lint from getting into jacks and ports
Includes OtterBox limited lifetime warranty (see website for details) and 100% authentic

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.7 out of 5 stars2,779 ratings4.7 out of 5 stars
